span.title: dateTime Type: A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month). If hours and minutes are specified, a UTC offset SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored. Dates SHALL be valid dates.

description.value: C.18 - EHDS refined base model for Medication administration

definition.value: C.18 - EHDS refined base model for Medication administration
Medication administration identifier
Will generally be set to show that the administration has been completed, but might include other sttus codes (e.g. completed, not-done, on-hold, in-progress, unknown)
Reason administration not performed
Administered medication
Specific date/time or interval of time during which the administration took place (or did not take place)
Condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered
Information about the administration
Details of how medication was taken
The patient who has the allergy or intolerance.
